File.AllUsersWebPart: <webParts> <webPart xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v3"> <metaData> <type name="CMICT.CSP.Web.ChangeUserPwd.ChangePassword.ChangePassword, $SharePoint.Project.AssemblyFullName$" /> <importErrorMessage>$Resources:core,ImportErrorMessage;</importErrorMessage> </metaData> <data> <properties> <property name="Title" type="string">ChangePassword</property> <property name="Description" type="string">修改用户密码</property> </properties> </data> </webPart> </webParts>

Property.Name: PublishingPageLayout
Property.Value: ~sitecollection/_catalogs/masterpage/LayoutPageForPopUp.aspx, 客户服务平台弹出页面布局页
